title: shakti umai bAlanai
sahitya:
shakti umai bAlanai sharavaNabhava guhanai sendil ANDavanai cintai sei manamE


anupallavi

  mukti tarum shIlanai mudal muDivAnavanai muruganai arumukhanai mukundan maruganai


caraNam    ArupaDai vIDamarndAnai kandanai sUra padumanai venrAnai vElanai
sura magaL kura magaL tirukkaram piDittAnai subrahmaNyanai shiva guruparanai
